mapper.select: SELECT c.city FROM city c INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.province_id WHERE p.province = #{province}
SELECT a.area FROM area a INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.city_id WHERE c.city = #{city}
SELECT h.housing_estate FROM housing_estate h INNER JOIN area a ON h.area_id = a.area_id AND a.area = #{area}

SELECT h.housing_estate, a.area, c.city, p.province FROM ((housing_estate h INNER JOIN area a ON h.area_id = a.area_id) INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.city_id) INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.province_id WHERE h.housing_estate_id = #{housing_estate_id}
SELECT a.area, c.city, p.province FROM (area a INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.city_id) INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.province_id WHERE a.area_id = #{area_id}
